item.description:
Herb is going to be leading a meaningful workshop about love, intimacy, affection and sex. Here is a description of the event from Herb:

”There's often so much confusion, vulnerability, fear and control around this part of life. Talk it out and look at lots of practical options for communication, choice, action and behavior. Get more clear on how to get your needs met in life and what you want to contribute. Herb specialized as a sex therapist for many years and will stand in as a commentator for Everything You Wanted to Know and Were Too Afraid to Ask!.”

The suggested minimum cost of attending the workshop is $15.00. A sliding scale of any amount is allowed if the cost would otherwise prevent you from coming. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40.00 so if you can afford more than $15.00, it helps the presenter and those who pay less.

Refreshments will be served. We are also welcomed to bring our own food as long as it is vegetarian.
item.name: Relating to Love, Intimacy, Affection and Sex
